model.name: cerfacs_corail_ssh
model.title: Cerfacs, code execution on CORAIL
model.desc: This plugin is for Cerfacs only It allows to execute a code on CORAIL from an external computer, or from the Cerfacs NFS system. [] On a production run, you can request a maximum of 192 processes (8 nodes , 24 procs each) [] Check that you can log on the distant machine without password!!!
